code: import{STATUS_TYPES}from"../types/statusTypes";var inputReducer=function inputReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:false;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case STATUS_TYPES.ON_REPLY:return action.payload;default:return state;}};export default inputReducer;
